name: Zebstrika
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

attacks.name: Disconnect
attacks.effect: Your opponent can’t play any Item cards from his or her hand during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Lightning Crash
attacks.effect: Discard all {L} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
